## IdentityWallet.getGenesisDIDMetadata() method

gets profile nonce by it's id. if profile is genesis identifier - 0 is returned

**Signature:**

```typescript
getGenesisDIDMetadata(did: DID): Promise<{
        nonce: number;
        genesisDID: DID;
    }>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  did | DID | profile that has been derived or genesis identity |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;{ nonce: number; genesisDID: DID; }&gt;

`{Promise<{nonce:number, genesisIdentifier: DID}>}`
